Study Abroad Summer High School Summer in New York City Programs for Visiting Students Open Arts Minors Blog Events Newsletters Videos Admin & Faculty Alumni Contact Us  home > Special Programs        Credit and Noncredit Costs for Summer Dance Festival  You may register as either a credit or non-credit student for the Dance Residency Festival.    You may register for Residency I (May 26-June 13, 2015), Residency II (June 16-July 3, 2015), or for both residencies (May 26-July 3, 2015). Credit: DANC-UT 1400 4 units | $5,156    Non-credit: NCRD-UT 5004 0 units | $2,440    Residency II*    Credit: DANC-UT 1401 4 units | $5,156    Non-credit: NCRD-UT 5005 0 units | $2,440    Both Residencies*    Credit: DANC-UT 1400 and DANC-UT 1401 8 units | $10,312    Non-credit: NCRD-UT 5004 and NCRD-UT 5005 0 units | $4,880    *These costs do not include non-refundable registration and services fees. Please click here for more information on tuition and fees . Summer Dance Festival: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        Dance Chair's Message / Social Undergraduate Graduate Course Offerings News & Events Performances Dance & New Media Live Summer High School Second Avenue Dance Company Alumni Current Students Admin & Faculty  home > Dance        Tisch Dance Summer Festival  Summer 2015 Residency Festival  Study With Innovative Contemporary Choreographers  Residency I: May 26 - June 13 Residency II: June 15 - July 2  The Department of Dance at Tisch School of the Arts offers two intensive three-week workshops to serve the intermediate-to-advanced dance student who is preparing to enter the profession. Students may participate in the program for either three or six weeks and will study with a minimum of three different companies in each session while being exposed to the workings of the other companies.    The program is based on strong technical training, achieved by concentrating on the healthy and efficient use of the body to realize each person’s physical potential, and the development of the imaginative and creative elements of each individual. To this end, we integrate the instruction from Tisch’s permanent faculty of master teachers with that of major guest artists and company members. Summer in NYC: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        Special Programs What Is Special Programs? Study Abroad Summer High School Summer in New York City Programs for Visiting Students Open Arts Minors Blog Events Newsletters Videos Admin & Faculty Alumni Contact Us  home > Special Programs > Summer in NYC        Summer in New York City   Follow Us:          Tweet        Tisch School of the Arts offers summer courses for college students and adult learners. There are undergraduate, graduate, and noncredit course options available. Please click on the programs of study below for 2015 courses and schedules. Registration is now open! The 2015 Summer in NYC Visiting Students Application Form and the Visiting Graduate Student Registration Form are available. Program Dates   Session I Tuesday, May 26-Thursday, July 2, 2015 Session II Monday, July 6-Saturday, August 15, 2015 Programs of Study:    Cinema Studies  Dance      Design for Stage and Film Drama      Dramatic Writing Game Center Intensives and Noncredit Certificates      Interactive Telecommunications Program (ITP)       Kanbar Institute of Film and Television      Musical Theatre Writing Noncredit Courses    Open Arts        Photography and Imaging Precollege Courses      The Clive Davis Institute of Recorded Music                                       Request Information Subscribe to the Tisch Special Programs Blog Summer 2015 Tuition Summer in NYC Information Summer Information for International Students  Visiting Graduate Student Summer 2015 Registration Form (pdf)  Office of Special Programs 721 Broadway, 12th Floor New York, NY 10003  Contact us!
